@screwfearme Some of you are so quick to jump the gun without really having an idea what you are talking about.. let me explain

1. Its a Cam job. 
2. Its a HD Cam job 
(originally recorded@1280x720p)
3. Video Stream was converted using the x264 encoder & muxed into a .mkv container
4. During conversion/encoding, it was cropped to remove potential unwanted artifacts (peoples heads; cinema surroundings; recorded on a slope etc)
5. Out of sync audio can be somewhat common with PIRATE CAMS. If you don't like, DON'T WHINGE, ABUSE THE UPLOADER or essentially DON'T DOWNLOAD!!!... maybe you can find a better torrent; do a better job with your camera or wait till it's avail on DVD/Bluray???

The torrent is FREE as opposed to paying $$$ to see in the cinema at its best.
